title: Pop. change effects pol and econ after 1950

content.question:
Directions: Suggested planning and writing time—35 minutes.

Write an essay that:

Has a relevant thesis.

Addresses all parts of the question.

Supports thesis with specific evidence.

Is well organized.

Analyze the political and economic effects of changing population patterns in Western Europe in the period circa 1950 to the present. Cite specific examples from at least TWO countries.

skill.text: Skill 4.A: Identify and describe a historical context for a specific historical development or process.
